title: நிர்மலா சீதாராமன் மகள் ராணுவத்தில் பணிபுரிகிறாரா?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: "CLARIFICATION". This is the photograph clicked at the request of the Army officer appointed as the LO to the RM during an official visit. She is NOT the daughter of the RM as suggested in some social media platforms pic.twitter.com/mkBQt2dLCK
